Package com.espertech.esper.jmx.mbean

MBean interfaces and exception classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AdministratorMBean
    Interface for administrative functions over an Esper engine instance.
    ListenerMBean
    Interface for functions over a statement's listener held in an Esper engine instance.
    NamedWindowMBean
    Interface for informaton on a given named window held by an Esper engine instance.
    RuntimeMBean
    Interface for runtime functions over an Esper engine instance.
    StatementMBean
    Interface for functions over a statement held in an Esper engine instance.
    StmtStreamNotifierType1MBean
    Broadcasting MBean for statement results, see StatementMBean.addStreamNotifierType1(java.lang.String, boolean, boolean).

Package com.espertech.esper.jmx.mbean Description

MBean interfaces and exception classes.
